mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GAME_ROOM (ROOM_NAME, GAME_NAME, PLATFORM, HOST, IS_TIME_LIMITED) VALUES (#{gameRoom.roomName}, #{gameRoom.gameName}, #{gameRoom.platform}, #{gameRoom.host}, #{gameRoom.isTimeLimited});
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM GAME_ROOM WHERE ROOM_NAME = #{gameRoom.roomName} AND HOST = #{gameRoom.host}
mapper.select: SELECT ID, ROOM_NAME, GAME_NAME, PLATFORM, HOST FROM GAME_ROOM ORDER BY ID
